solution_line_template: Each dog would eat {food_per_dog_per_day_grams} grams so {num_dogs} will would eat {num_dogs} x {food_per_dog_per_day_grams} grams = <<{num_dogs}*{food_per_dog_per_day_grams}={total_food_per_day_grams}>>{total_food_per_day_grams} grams of food per day.

Emily is going on vacation for {vacation_days} days and with the 4 dogs together eating {total_food_per_day_kg} kilogram of food per day, {vacation_days} days x {total_food_per_day_kg} kg of food/day = <<{vacation_days}*{total_food_per_day_kg}={total_food_needed_kg}>>{total_food_needed_kg} kg of food would be enough for two weeks.
